meanings.definition: To achieve victory in a competition or conflict.
meanings.sent1: She wins every game she plays.
meanings.sent2: He wins the race by running fast.
meanings.sent3: The cat wins the chase with the mouse.
meanings.sent4: The sun wins the battle against the clouds.
meanings.sent5: The team wins the championship with hard work.

meanings.sent1: His many wins in sports make him a champion.
meanings.sent2: The team celebrates their latest win.
meanings.sent3: The cat's win in the race surprises everyone.
meanings.sent4: The win in the debate was well-deserved.
meanings.sent5: Her win in the lottery changes her life.
